inn1.comm: wide of off stump, Smith gets a good look at it and leaves it alone
a little closer but still far away enough for Smith to get a step forward and shoulder arms
this one's wider and swinging away, a good line, and Smith comfortabtly leaves it alone
good ball again, full and swinging away outside off stump, and a good leave from Smith
fraction wide, Smith frees the arms and chops that on the bounce in the gap at gully for one down to wide third man, South Africa off the mark
beauty of a ball, full a tad outside off stump and moving, Boosman stands leaden-footed and pokes at it, beaten all ends up and the ball dies as Dhoni collects
poor ball to begin with, swings down leg and Dhoni collects, wide called, duly
wide of off stump and swinging away, Smith doesnt want to mess with it and its called wide again, not a good start this from Zaheer
better, full and moving in, Smith squeezes the drive to a diving Raina at point
Zaheer strikes! A great, swinging delivery that moves in from off stump and catches Smith standing smack in front of middle and leg, a loud appeal from Zaheer and the umpire agrees, big wicket that
good, moving ball that leaves him and he shoulders arms confidently
another good ball moves across him and he has a nibble at it, ball misses kissing the edge, Dhoni takes
moves from middle and leg across him, and he shoulders arms with a small step forward

excellent ball! Lands on middle and leg and moves across him sharply, theres some kick there too, Kallis goes half-forward and pokes at it, ball rears and misses taking the edge, good stuff from Zaheer
fullish and moving down leg, some movement, Bosman falls over going for the flick and  gets rapped on the pad, Munaf appeals bus that was going down leg
full outside off stump, driven hard to cover, cant find the gap there
lands outside off stump and moves in, catches Bosman on the hop, ball hits the inside thigh and pops up in front of point, theres some juice in this track
pitches on leg stump and moving down, again he's caught in two-minds, rapped on the pads again
full on off stump, driven loosely and he gets a little inside edge in front of square leg, Mongia moves across and the batsmen get two
well bowled! Lands outside off stump and moves in a tad, Bosman is caught defending half-cock and the ball shaves past the outer edge of the bat
moves one across him from middle and off, Kallis shoulders arms with ease
this one lands on off and moves away, again Kallis shoulders arms with a step forward
full and moving away, Kallis sqaure-drives streakily and gets one down to third man to get off the mark, ball was in the gap anyways, so safe
quite far away from leg stump, Dhoni moves across and collects
good, full ball on off stump, Kallis comes forward and allows the ball to come onto him, just drops the soft hands and keeps it down to point
good length on the stump, a comfortable length, Bosman stands and defends, wasnt in control however, shuffling and taking the bottom hand off the bat
well struck! Full on off stump, he gets a half stride forward and punches that back down the ground with authority, as straight as they come, four runs
good, full ball moving in from outside off stump, defended with ease
full again and moving in, driven and gets an inside edge that yields two past square leg, not in control at all
full outside off stump, Kallis gets to the pitch of it, frees the arms, and drives between cover and mid-off for four, good shot
good ball outside off and moving in, defended off the back foot
good length outside off, he comes forward and defends, ball takes the edge and rolls down to third man for one
good length ball on the stumps, catches him on the hop but he manages to turn that off the hips for two down to Agarkar moving across from backward square leg
pitches outside leg stump and moves in, catches him on the pad as he falls over going for the flick
full on middle and leg, Kallis drives fluently to Harbhajan at mid-on
good ball, lands on middle and leg and rears, squares up Kallis who defends and gets an edge that lands in front of Dravid at a deep second slip, lucky that
a good length on middle and leg, he stands tall and drops that in front of midwickt and calls for the run, gets it in good time even as the throw is off key
full on off stump, Kallis comes forward and defends that with soft hands, ball rolls to the off side and he calls for the run, early, and gets it with ease
a good ball moving across him, he comes forward and shoulders arms
full and in the zone outside off stump, easy pickings for a player of Kallis's class, leans into the cover drive and creams that in the offside gap for four, too good
moves in from off stump and catches him hurrying into his defense, that ball kept low but Kallis did well to adjust
lands outside off stump and kicks, Kallis followed it and manages to not get an edge, well bowled
full outside off stump, Kallis gets forward and defends comfortably
lands outside off stump on a full length and moves in, Kallis knows where his off stump is and shoulders arms
short of a good length and Kallis hops and chop-cuts that to point, no chance of a run
good ball on middle and leg, moves into him as he hops and defends
fullish on leg stump, Bosman looks to flick that with power but doesnt time it well enough, gets an edge down to fine leg
full on the legs again, this time he places that much better and whips that in the gap at midwicket for four, was bowled at 129.4 kmph
good length on the stump, he hops and angles that in the gap at gully for one
short of a good length on leg stump, Kallis turns that around the corner for one down to Agarkar at fine leg
good length on the stumps, defended with relative ease, ball had some bounce on it
full outside off stump, driven firmly to mid-off, cant beat the man there
short of a good length outside off stump, Kallis stands and defends in front of point
back of a good length outside off stump, Kallis hurried into his backfoot defense back to Agarkar
short of a length outside off stump, enough room for him to pounce on that one and he just cracks that between cover and point for four, thats 1000 ODI runs for Kallis against India
fullish on off stump, Kallis defends uneasily back to Agarkar who fields moving to his left
fraction short and wide again, he stands and crunches that off the backfoot but ca n only find Raina at point

full outside off stump, Bosman gives it the kitchen sink, doesnt time it well and the ball flies up in the air over cover and lands well over the fielders near the ropes, streaky shot, 130.6ks on that ball
good ball, lands outside off stump and beats his backfoot defense
short and wide and he smacks that past point with some power, super shot

gone! Full and furious on the stump, Bosman's expecting a short ball and goes back, then falls over as he looks to whip that through leg but cant make any contact, caught on the backfoot plumb in front and the umpire has no hesitation in giving that out
good ball moves across him from middle and off, he shoulders arms
full on the stumps, he comes forward and defends to cover, good over from Zaheer
full on the off stump, comes forward and defends with ease
full on the stumps, driven back to Agarkar
good ball, fullish outside off stump and moves in, keeps fairly low and Kallis is caught on the hop, nearly falls over
full on the stumps, Kallis gets over it and whips that past square leg for two
short and wide, asking for trouble, but Kallis mistimes the square cut and finds Raina at backward point
full on middle and leg, he works that to square leg
good ball on the stumps, comes forward and defends in the gap at cover
full again, pushed into the offside for one to get off the mark
good ball moves across him from middle and off, he leaves it alone
full and wide, and Kallis stands and smacks that on the up past cover and point for four, immense shot
full outside off stump, this time he gets to the pitch and punches that past a diving mid-off for four more
better ball outside off stump, he comes forward and defends
good, full ball on the stumps, defended to the off side
full and a tad slower, he comes forward and drives to mid-off, calls of 'WAIT' back to his partner
a good length on the stumps, some movement there, he stands and tries to work that through midwicket, not timed well
full outside off stump, comes forward and defends to the off side
good, full ball smack on the off stump, defended uneasily, ball pops up for a second but lands safely
shortish length this time, he hops and defends with soft hands, a good over
full outside off stump and moving away, left alone with ease
full and moving away again, gets a small step forward and shoulders arms, Munaf inviting the drive here
full again, this time Kallis obliges and drives that in the off side gap and picks up four more, good shot, 127kmh on that ball
fuller and slower outside off stump, he comes forward and defends
full and wide, this time Kallis cant time his cover drive well enough, ends up hitting that into the ground
full outside the off stump, he gets to the pitch and drives to mid-off
full and wide, gets to the pitch and gently eases that in front of cover for a quick single
good length ball outside off stump, comes forward and defends to cover
full and wide of off stump, Kallis easily lets that pass
full on off stump, varies his place and hurries one onto Kallis, who falls over his front-foot defense and gets an inside edge to the on side
full outside off stump, Kallis drives that elegantly to Kaif at cover
a good length outside off stump, Kallis shuffles back and across and drives to mid-off
good length outside the off stump, Gibbs back away and drives to point
good ball on off stump, slower delivery, Gibbs comes across and drives to mid-on

gone! A good, swinging ball outside off stump, Gibbs' feet go nowhere as he tries to run that down to third man but gets a thin edge through to a diving Dhoni, moving to his right, and his shaky innings comes to an end
good length ball outside the off stump, draws the compact forward defence from de Villiers
another good ball outside off stump, de Villiers gets on top of it and defends to cover with a firm 'NO' to Kallis
this ones straigher and de Villiers turns the hands to midwicket, but no run, a good over from Munaf
short and wide outside off stump, 137.8kmh, comes onto him but his eyes were all over it, takes it from that spot and pulls hard over midwicket, in full control of the shot and he gets four
a half-volley on leg stump, 132.4ks, and he easily whips that past square leg for four more, fine balance in that shot
full outside off stump, no real movement, Kallis shoulders arms
quicker and fuller outside off stump, he goes for a drive and gets an inside edge to the leg side
full outside off stump, driven to Kaif at cover
short and wide, de Villiers slices that hard but cant beat Raina at backward point
full on off stump, Kallis comes forward and defends with ease
full outside off stump, driven to cover
full ball on the stumps, driven to cover again
quicker ball on the stumps, comes forward and defends to cover
full outside off stump, moves away, Kallis shoulders arms
good length outside off stump, Kallis shuffles and then drives back to the bowler
good, quick ball outside off stump that gets some lift, de Villiers leaves it alone, some tidy bowling this now from India
full and wide, de Villiers gets down on his knees and square-drives past Raina at  backward point for two down to third man
changes his pace, slows it down outside off stump, driven off the back foot to Raina at backward point
full and wide, moving away, de Villiers gets a step forward and shoulders arms
full on middle and leg, worked with soft hands in front of mid-on for a quick single
drifts to leg stump and its whipped past square leg for one
good length outside off stump, Kallis shuffles and ends up driving back to the bowler
short and wide, Kallis rocks back and cuts that with power and Raina at backward  point dives to his left but cant take it, it was dying on him but he even failed to save the runs, was firmly struck
full outside the off stump, defended
good length on the stumps, worked to midwicket
quick ball that moves in from middle and off, tucks him up but he manages to work that in front of midwicket for a quick run
full and wide, Kallis goes for a firm drive but cant beat Raina at point, his 50 will have to wait
tossed up on middle and leg, worked to square leg for one
tossed up, swept hard to fine leg to bring up his 50, well played
tossed up, driven to mid-on
outside off stump, guided to Raina at point
tossed up outside off stump, he unleashes a cheeky sweep that takes the edge and pops over Dhonis head for two
tossed up on off stump, de Villiers comes forward and defends
flatter outside off stump, he charges down and whips that to short midwicket
tossed up, gets forward and defends
flatter line, he goes back and defends back to Harbhajan
tossed up on off stump, de Villiers sweeps powerfully in front of square and finds the deep square leg ropes, firm shot that
flatter on off stump, Kallis comes forward and defends to cover-point
quicker and going down leg, strikes Kallis on the back leg but the umpire shakes his head
quicker, and hes mixed this up, ball goes onto the legs and catches Kallis on the hop
fuller and tossed up on middle and leg, Kallis cant work that away
seams this one up on off stump, Kallis can only drive to mid-off, a maiden over
tossed up on middle and leg, driven down the ground, Harbhajan moves to his right and saves it
flatter on middle and leg, whipped to square leg for one
tossed up outside off stump, Kallis gets on top of it and defends to point
tossed up again, this time its driven towards mid-on, Harbhajan dives and collides with the nonstriker
tossed up outside off stump, comes forward and defends to the off side
tossed up again outside off stump, he gets over it and pushes that in front of point for a quick run
flat outside off stump, square driven to Raina at backward point
full outside off stump, pushed to cover for one
lands one on middle and leg, worked to midwicket
lands this seam-up on off stump, de Villiers drives back to Sachin
slower outside off stump, squeezed to backward point for one
on the pads, tapped away behind square for an easy single - 100 on the card for South Africa
played back down the track
quicker delivery, forced away towards point - no room for a single there
fuller and on the pads, nudged past the fielder at midwicket
took on the fielder at midwicket and cleared him comfortably - healthy bolw that
starts off with a quicker delivery outside the off stump, Kallis waits for it and at the last moment taps it down to third man for a single
defended watchfully
fuller and close to the off stump line, driven well wide of Kaif at extra cover
Kallis finds Kaif there - Tendulkar rushing through the over here
held it back, played away towards cover
bit of width offered but Kallis finds the fielder at point - end of a good over from Tendulakr
tossed up and turning in, de Villiers pushes forward in an attempt to work it away on the leg side but fails to make contact
this time he waits for the ball and works it away behind square on the leg side
flatter trajectory - Kallis is made to defend and the ball rolls away past the keeper
Harbhajan mixing it up nicely here - quicker one on this occasion and Kallis ends up with an inside edge
driven straight back past the bower to the long-on region for an easy single - Harbhajan dived across in an attempt to spot the ball but failed to get a touch on it
worked away towards midwicket, fielder moves across quickly and cuts off the single - another good over for India comes to an end
104.4 kmp take that! full and wide outside the off stump, Kallis throws his bat at it ruthlessly and the ball sails away to the point fence, 50 partnership comes up
good come back, tight delivery and Kallis is made to defend
quicker delivery on the stumps, defended on the front-foot
101.3 kmp four more! another wide delivery outside the off stump and Kallis duly dispatches it to the cover fence, Mongia in the deep had no chance of cutting it off, excellent placement
fuller and close to the off stump line, played away towards cover
massive sweep and the ball races away to the fine leg fence - valiant diving effort in the deep from Agarkar ends in vain

86.1 kmp six more! de Villiers is turning the heat on here - flighted delivery on the middle and off stump, de Villiers goes down on one knee and slog sweeps it over the midwicket fence for the first six of the innings  - top shot that
and under pressure Harbhajan loses his line and length, way down the leg side and Dhoni had no chance of cutting it off - this is turning out to be a massive over for South Africa
worked away nicely for an easy single, this is good cricket form de Villiers
much better line, defended watchfully
played away on the leg side
another easy single added to the total
driven straight to the fielder at cover
another back-foot drive finds Kaif at extra cover
worked away well wide of the fielder at midwicket, good over so far from the little master
quicker and on the middle and leg stump line, de Villiers had to hurry there
width offered outside the off stump, de Villiers cuts hard but the ball goes straight to the fielder at deep point
played away towards point
drifting in with the arm, Kallis goes for the drive but fails to get it past the fielder at point
slightly short, Kallis rocks back and drives it through cover point for a single
driven down to long-on
played away off the back-foot to the cover region, gets it wide of the fielder and they cross over for an easy single
again worked away square on the off side for an easy single
off cutter, de Villiers goes for the drive and ends up with a thick inside edge
quicker and flatter, driven back to the bowler
another dot ball - again on the stumps and de Villiers is made to play defensively
nicely drive away past the fielder at point, single brings Kallis to the fore
close to the off stump line, Kallis finds the gap between cover and point
worked away behind square on the leg side, sloppy fielding gives away an extra run
tossed up on the stumps, driven straight back to the bowler
slightly short and Kallis once again nicely finds the gap between point and cover
driven away behind point, third man moves across quickly and cuts off the single
on the middle and leg stump line, worked away on the leg side
150 comes up - turned away well wide of the fielder at short fine leg

As someone once put it so eloquently, you sometimes think a brain transplant is in order - harmless delivery outside the off stump, de Villiers goes for a reverse sweep and gets beaten by miles. Dhoni quickly whips of the bails and de Villiers is out by a long way - third umpire confirms
driven down to long-off for an easy single
worked away for an easy single - Boucher off the mark first ball
quicker delivery, defended
drifting down the leg side and Kallis helps it down to fine leg for an easy single, this is turning out to be another good over from Tendulkar
played away towards point, no room for a single there - well bowled
full and close to the off stump line, played away towards point
again fuller but on the middle and off stump line, Kallis nicely gets behind the line drives it down to long-on for a single
makes room and drives hard but fails to get it past Kaif at extra cover
nicely worked away on the leg side and they scamper through for a single
punched away towards cover and once again they scamper through for a single
worked away through the vacant square leg region, easy single to end the over
pitched outside the off stump and coming in with the arm, Boucher drives it through extra cover for a single
worked away on the leg side
another tight delivery but Boucher manages to squeeze it away for a single on the leg side
driven off the back-foot to deep cover, looks like Kallis can find those gaps blindfolded
off the pads to the short fine leg region
and the final ball too yields just a single - sweeper on the off side has been kept busy
on the middle and leg stump line, worked away towards midwicket for an easy single
slightly fuller and on the middle and off stump line, Kallis picks up the length early and drills it straight back past the bowler to the long-on fence, classy shot
on the middle and leg stump line, Kallis shuffles across a bit and turns it away through midwicket
good length delivery, angled across the right-hander, Boucher leaves it through to the keeper

as they say 'Some mistakes are too much fun to only make once' - with mid-off and mid-on inside the circle, Khan once again pitches it up on the stumps and Boucher elegantly beats the fielder at mid-off
flicked away well wide of the fielder at midwicket
turning in from close to the off stump line, Boucher stays back and works it away behind square on the leg side
quicker and fuller, defended watchfully
glanced away behind square on the leg side
goes for the sweep but fails to connect, ball clips the arm and pops up behind the stumps. Huge appeal turned down and rightly so
on the middle and off stump line, turning in - swept away behind sqaure for an easy single
quicker delivery to end the over - Kallis reads it well and drives it down to long-on
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, no real width offered there - Kallis opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man for an easy single
another short of a good length delivery, Boucher goes for the pull but fails to connect and the ball rolls away off the pad
131.6 kmp good length delivery, pitched close to the off stump line and coming in with the angle - Boucher just goes across the line and connects well and the ball finds the midwicket fence
132.7 kmp short ball on the stumps, a nothing delivery - Boucher gets enough time to wind up and the ball screams away to the midwicket fence, that's the Boucher we know
inside edge onto the pads and the ball rolls away away on the leg side
gets the edge but the ball falls short of Dhoni - excellent delivery to end the over
driven down to mid-off for a single
tossed up outside the off stump, Kallis nicely opens the face of the bat and glides it past the fielder at backward point - runs hard and comfortably makes it back for the third
fuller and on the stumps, Boucher moves across and flicks it away through midwicket
flighted delivery, defended on the front-foot
punched straight back to the bowler, nervous nineties?
driven away through extra cover and the single takes Kallis to 96
steered away towards point, no room for a single there
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, defended on the back-foot
punched down to mid-on and Kallis moves to 97

Boucher perishes trying to force the pace, with Kallis slowing down Boucher really had no other option. Good length delivery outside the off stump - Boucher makes room and goes inside out over cover, looked like a meaty blow but the ball went straight to Zaheer Khan at deep cover, South Africa five down.
rising delivery, Kallis opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man
short delivery on the middle and leg stump line, Kemp stands tall on the back-foot and defends it down on the leg side. Early call and a quickly single is added to the total
on the stumps, turned away towards midwicket
pitched close to the off stump line and turning in, Kemp is made to defend
turned away off the pads to the midwicket region, diving stop by the fielder at midwicket cuts off the single, excellent over so far
fuller and on the pads, Kemp pushes forward and drives it down to long-on for a brace
drifting onto middle and leg, Kemp waits for the ball and at the last moment turns it away well wide of the fielder at midwicket
starts off with a quick delivery on the pads, Kemp fails to get it away
turned away to deep midwicket, Kallis turns down the call for a second
punched wide of the cover fielder and Kallis moves to 99
pushed away towards short cover
punched off the back-foot to the long-on region
100! tossed up on the pads and Kallis drives it down to long-on. This is his 14th ODI hundred and the first against India - well played and he gets a standing ovation from the home crowd
swept away to deep midwicket, again just a single
punched straight back to the bowler
full and on the pads, driven down to long-on
width offered outside the off stump but Kallis fails to cash in - runs it off the face of the bat but fails to get it past the fielder at gully
goes for the sweep and makes contact
long-on is as far as it goes, another good over for India comes to an end
edged and gone! short of a good length delivery, close to the off stump line and shaping away a touch. Kemp pushes at it away from his body and the edge is produced - Dhoni makes no mistake
short of a good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, Pollock gets behind the line and defends it away towards midwicket
another dot ball. again short and close to the off stump line - Pollock gets on top of the bounce and plays it down on the off side

and that's the end of that. short and wide outside the off stump, Pollock goes across the line, ball clips the inner half of the bat and spoons up towards mid-on - Tendulkar swoops in from the edge of the circle and takes it cleanly
pushed away off the back-foot to the point region
driven wide of the cover fielder
on target, played back to the bowler
goes for the sweep and gets hit on the pad, loud appeal for lbw turned down
full and on the pads, Kallis goes right back and flicks it away through midwicket
worked away towards midwicket, again just a single
pushes forward and drives it down to long-on
Nel! big swing of the bat and the ball races away to the midwicket fence, there was a fielder placed in the deep but he hardly got any time to react
defended on the back-foot and the ball rolls away towards cover
he gets another one through. full and on the stumps, Nel lines it up nicely and drives it in the air and well wide of the diving fielder at mid-off
excellent come back delivery, Agarkar bangs it in short - Nel goes after it but on this occasion he fails to make contact - missed it by a long way
played away to deep midwicket, easy single and Kallis is back on strike
132.5 kmphalf-volley outside the off stump and Kallis dispatches it to the extra cover fence - that was a powerful hit
106.6 kmp four more - again in the zone out the off stump, Kallis winds up and drills it past the fielder at extra cover, 14 off the over
full and straight, Nel goes for the drive and the ball rolls away off the outer half of the bat
driven wide of the fielder at cover
swung away to wide long on, fielder moves across quickly in the deep and keeps it down to just a single
driven away towards cover, bit of a mix-up going for the single but in the end they make it across safely
another big swing but again just a single down to wide long-on
pitched on middle and off and angling across, Kallis stands his ground and drives hard but is beaten by the angle - end of a fine over from Khan
good length delivery, close to the off stump line - Nel swing across the line, ball clips the inside edge and races away to the fine leg region, single brings Kallis back on strike
full and on the stumps, tight delivery - Kallis makes room and hammers it straight back past the bowler to the long-on region - runs hard and comfortably makes it back for the second
driven down to long-on for a single
half volley on the stumps and Nel slogs it over the wide long-on fence - good clean hit
much better line - yorker on the stumps and Nel digs it down to third man

another yorker length delivery and Kallis drives it straight back to Agarkar - Nel looking for a single is half way down the track. Agarkar keeps his cool, walks across and distubs the stumps - South Africa end up 248 on the board.

inn2.comm: starts off with a good length delivery, pitched close to the off stump line and coming in with the angle - Jaffer gets well forward and defends it with a straight bat
difting onto middle and leg, ball clips the pads and rolls away on the leg side

end of the beginning! Jaffer's ODI debut lasts just three balls. Short of a good length delivery, close to the off stump line and shaping in a touch, Jaffer goes at it with no real footwork, a nothing shot in the end - ball clips the inside edge and crashes into the stumps.
slightly short and drifting onto middle and leg, Kaif stays back and tries to work it away fine but fails to make contact, ball clips the pad and rolls away square on the leg side
defended outside the off stump
good length delivery, this one nipped back in sharply and Kaif takes it on the pad - loud appeal for lbw turned down - probably missing leg
short of a good length delivery, fraction too wide and shaping away - Tendulkar leaves it through to the keeper
another short of a good length delivery and this one came in with the arm, Tendulakr gets right on top of the bounce and defends it with a straight bat
on the middle and off stump line. Tendulkar shuffles across a bit, once again gets right behind the line and taps it away on the leg side
good length delivery outside the off stump, this one went straight on - Tendulkar on the front-foot defending. Looks like Plan-B is in place.

another shot ball and this one kept bit low after hitting the deck - Tendulkar goes for the pulls and the ball rolls away off the inner half of the bat - easy single down to fine leg and Tendulkar is off the mark
peach of a delivery to end the over. short rising and right in the channel outside the off stump, Kaif pokes at it tentatively and the ball zips past the outside edge
starts off with a ripper - good length delivery in the channel outside the off stump and Tendulkar is beaten all ends up
drifts on to middle and leg and Tendulkar nicely tucks it away through the gap between mid-on and midwicket
another line and length delivery, defended watchfully
on the middle and leg stump line, Tendulkar leans well forward, gets right on top of the ball and clips it away towards square leg - excellent diving effort from Bosman save runs
another channel delivery with some away swing at the tail end, left alone outside the off stump
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, steered down to third man for an easy single
Ntini is spitting fire here. This one kicked off a good length area and Tendulkar was clueless, luckily for India the ball clipped the glove and spooned over the slip cordon
another short rising delivery, this one came back in from touch outside the off stump - Tendulkar on the back-foot defending
short of a good length delivery, no real width offered there but Tendulkar goes for the cut, a fairly late decision - ball clips the outer half of the bat and rolls away on the off side
driven away towards cover
defended on the back-foot, Ntini is consistently hitting the right areas
short and wide outside the off stump, Tendulkar goes after it but fails to make contact and the ball sails through to the keeper
Ntini drifts onto middle and leg and Tendulkar turns it away with a touch of artistry, long chase and a sliding effort save one run
Classy. Good length delivery outside the off stump, Tendulkar goes back, makes bit of room and drills it right into the gap between the cover fielders
turned away off the pads to the midwicket region
defended watchfully
this one jags back in and Kaif is beaten by the angle, get hit bit high on the pad - appeal for lbw turned down
line and length delivery outside the off stump, defended on the front-foot
off-cutter, slightly short in length, Kaif gets behind the line and taps it away on the leg side
bowled from wide of the crease and coming in with the angle - Tendulkar shuffles across a bit, gets right behind the line and presents the full face of the bat&

good length delivery outside the off stump, again coming in with the angle, Tendulkar goes right back - making full use of the depth of the crease and strokes it through cover point. Nicely turned his wrists at the point of impact and the ball just raced away across the turf - nothing more than a gentle punch. Marvellous Marvin would have been proud of that
inside edge and the ball rolls away towards midwicket
turned away towards midwicket, Bosman moves across quickly but he fails to stop the single - excellent running between the wickets
Kaif too join in - short ball on the stumps, Kaif stands tall and pulls it away through midwicket for the second boundary of the over
fuller and quicker, defended watchfully - end of a good over for India
defended on the back-foot
good length delivery, defended on the back-foot
another good length delivery and this time Pollock drifts on to middle and leg, Tendulkar hops into position and turns it away behind square on the leg side
driven well wide of the fielder at extra cover and they scamper through for the second
in the channel outside the off stump, defended on the back-foot
good length delivery outside the off stump, nothing special there but Kaif leaves it through to the keeper
another amazing back-foot drive, again nothing more than a gently punch and the ball raced away to the point fence - all timing and wrist. Tendulkar is looking good here
better line and length, defended on the front-foot
fuller in length and Tendulkar is drawn into the drive, ball clips the outer half of the bat and rolls away towards cover

and the party continues - good length delivery on the middle and off stump line. Tendulkar quickly gets into a good position, head over the ball and flicks it away through midwicket. Another long case ends in vain

good length delivery and this one nipped back in sharply, Tendulkar is beaten by the angle and the ball hits the pad right in front of the stumps - looked plumb but umpire Doctrove adjudicates in favour of the batsman
driven away towards cover
good length delivery outside the off stump, driven away on the off side
another typical Pollock delivery - perfect line and length and in the channel, Kaif gets behind the line and defends it with a straight bat
wicket to wicket delivery, played away off the back-foot and once again the ball rolls away towards cover
slightly short and cutting in, Kaif stays back and turns it away towards midwicket
bit of width offered outside the off stump, Kaif played it late and found the gap between mid-off and cover

131.3 kmp Pollock strikes again - good length delivery outside the off stump, Kaif drive off the back-foot, ball kicks up just the extra bit - clips the shoulder of the bat and goes high towards point - Gibbs there times his jump to perfection and takes it high over his head. India two down
short rising delivery on the stumps, defended on the back-foot and the ball rolls away towards midwicket
defended watchfully
tucked away well wide of the fielder at midwicket, early call and a quick single is taken
short of a good length delivery, hits the deck hard and this one nips back in sharply - Dravid stays back, gets behind the line and taps it away towards cover - well played in the end
good length delivery, defended on the front-foot
Ripper. Short delviery, bowled from wide of the crease and coming in with the angle - Dravid had to play at it and the ball zips past the outside edge. Beaten for pace there
good length delivery outside the off stump, this one kept its line after hitting the deck - Tendulkar gets his left foot across, covers the stumps and leaves it through to the keeper
driven off the back-foot and the ball finds the fielder at cover
defended outside the off stump
close to the off stump line - Tendulkar goes right back square drives it towards point, excellent stop from Gibbs there cuts off a certain boundary
on the middle and off stump line, turned away towards midwicket
punched down to mid-on
left alone outside the off stump
short rising delivery, this one went straight on - Dravid stands tall and taps it away on the leg side
punched off the back-foot to the point region
off cutter - again short and coming in with the angle, Dravid stands tall and defends it back down the track

off the mark in style. Ntini goes wider, again coming in with the angle but bit too wide on this occasion, Dravid nicely opens the face of the bat and runs it down to the third man fence - tough shot but Dravid made it look easy
cut away off the back foot to the third man region, easy single to end the over
in the channel outside the off stump, extra bounce and Dravid watfully defends it away towards short cover
another short rising delivery on the middle and leg stump line, defended awkwardly
short delivery outside the off stump, Dravid stands tall on the back-foot, gets right on top of the bounce and chops it past the fielder at backward point - third man hardly got any time to react
defended on the back-foot
off-cutter, defended on the back-foot

short of a good length delivery and this one shaped away a touch after hitting the deck, Dravid goes for the drive off the back-foot and the ball goes past the outside edge - excellent delivery to end the over
short and coming in with the angle, Tendulkar once again hops into position and turns it away well in front of square on the leg side
bit of extra bounce but Tendulkar had it covered - gets on top of the bounce and taps it away towards midwicket
worked away off the back-foot to the deep midwicket region
Langeveldt drifts down the leg side and Dravid helps it down to fine leg for a single
another brilliant stop at square leg save few more runs - turned away nicely off the back-foot and Tendulkar took off straightaway but Bosman 's full length diving stop made him change his mind
inside edge and the ball races away to fine leg
starts off with a short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Tendulkar reads it well and presents the full face of the bat
mis-timed drive, ball clips the inner half of the bat and rolls away on the leg side
turned away off the pads to the fine leg region
excellent bouncer - Dravid nicely sways away and leaves it through to the keeper, one for the over signalled. Nel with the extended follow through - surprising.
left alone outside the off stump
nudged away towards square leg for an easy single
short and drifting down the leg side, pulled away to fine leg for an easy single
glided down to third man
good length delivery, driven away towards cover
defended back to the bowler - solid shot
short delivery on the stumps and Dravid goes for the pull, ball clips the top-edge and flies down to the fine leg fence

what a delivery - good length and this one nipped back in sharply after hitting the deck, Dravid pushes forward and the ball sneaks through the big gap between bat and pad. That's a bit wicket - India in deep trouble here
pushes forward and defends it away towards cover

and Nel plucks Tendulkar! good length delivery, this one too nipped back in, Tendulkar goes for the drive, ball clips the inside edge and crashes into the woodwork. Another massive wicket and the bells are ringing.
defended towards cover
sharp bouncer - Raina nicely leaves it through to the keeper
defended back to the bowler
angled across the left-hander, Raina goes for the drive and is beaten by the anlge
short rising delivery - no-ball called for overstepping
bit of width offered outside the off stump, Dhoni opens the face of the bat in an attempt to run it down to third man, ball clips the outer half of the bat and runs down to the third man fence
left alone outside the off stump
short of a good length delivery, bit wide outside the off stump. Dhoni moves across a long way but in the end shoulders arms and the ball sails through to Boucher
driven away well in front of point, shapr bit of fielding from de Villiers saves runs
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, no shot offered
gets well forward and defends it way towards cover
short and angling across - Rain leaves it through to the keeper
again angled across, this time Raina has a poke at it and the ball rips past the outside edge

short delivery on the rib-cage, Raina looking to turn it away ends up with a thick edge and the ball pops up behind. Boucher sprints across to his right and throws himself across but the ball falls painfully wide of the outstretched hand, would have been a stunner had he pulled it off
bouncer and Dhoni ducks under it
another well directed bouncer, Dhoni once again ducks under
played down to mid-on, quick single taken
slightly short and close to the off stump line, Dhoni quickly shifts his weight onto the back-foot and hammers it through cover point
wicket to wicket delviery, driven straight back to the bowler
this one stopped a bit after hitting the deck, Dhoni is early into the drive and the ball rolls away off the outer half of the bat
again called for overstepping - good lenght and on the middle and off stump line, driven straight back to the bowler
angled into the pads and Dhoni drives it away towards midwicket

meaty blow - short and close to the off stump line. Dhoni leans back, makes room and chops it past the fielder at backward point. Placement was spot on and the third man fielder had no chance of cutting it off
edged away past the diving gully fielder
good length delivery, driven away towards extra cover
short of a good length delivery, punched off the back-foot to the cover region
turned away off the back-foot to the vacant square leg region - easy two
short of a good length delivery, cutting in sharply from wide outside the off stump - Dhoni shuffles across and taps it away towards midwicket
short and angling across, defended watchfully
drifting onto the pads and Raina tucks it down to fine leg for an easy single
fuller length delivery and Dhoni drive hard eyeing the cover fence but the shot is not timed well enough and the ball rolls away off the inner half of the bat
left alone outside the off stump
pitched up and coming in with the angle, driven straight back to the bowler
another wicket to wicket delivery, driven back

short of a good length delivery, pitched close to the off stump line and angling across - fairly harmless delivery, Raina has a harmless poke at it and the ball goes straight to Kallis at second slip, no harm done.
on the middle and off stump line, defended on the back-foot
another short rising delivery on the stumps, defended watchfully
bouncer down the leg side, pulled away to deep fine leg for a single
yorker outside the off stump, Dhoni jams his bat down and digs it out towards cover

Nel hammers in another nail - slightly short and cutting in sharply, Dhoni was all set to leave it through to the keeper but the ball kept coming in with the angle, and in the end the ball brushed the glove and went straight to the keeper
short and wide outside the off stump, Mongia goes after it and gets beaten by a long way
defended back to the bowler
driven off the front-foot and the ball rolls away towards cover
played off the back-foot and the ball rolls down the track

fuller length delivery, pitched wide outside the off stump and angling across the left-hander. Mongia drives at it away from his body with no real footwork and the edge finds Kemp at second slip - seven down three more to go
off-cutter, defended on the front-foot
cut off the back-foot to the third man region
nasty bounce and Agarkar is beaten outside the off stump
short delivery outside the off stum, cut and a miss - this won't last long
bouncer and through to the keeper
left alone and the ball sails through to the keeper
fullish on leg stump, he stands and drives loosely, ball raps the pads
gone! Lands around off stump and moves in to strike him on the front leg in front of about leg and middle, a loud appeal is upheld and India have slipped further
welcomed with a bouncer that sails across his left shoulder, Zaheer gets out of harm's way
good, pacy ball that lands outside off stump and cuts in sharply, but he lets it go with ease
good ball, a tad fuller and moving in but he stands and defends off the back foot
good length delivery outside off stump, dug out to backward point
good length ball nips in from outside off stump, he jumps and gets the bat down on it, ball rolls towards backward point
lands outside off stump and gets some bounce on it, Zaheer stands up on his toes and chases it, gets beaten and Boucher takes
short ball swings into him and he has to hop and fend it down into the off side, ball shoots to the right of Gibbs at point and they think about the run but resist

bye! Bangs one in a short outside off stump, and all Zaheer can do is some how duck into it, takes the eyes of it and ends up gloving it through to Boucher, Nel is cock-a-hoop and why not, South Africa are one wicket away from victory
bangs one in very short outside off stump, wont really bother Munaf who just backs away and lets Boucher collect it
full and wide outside off stump, Munaf stands there and reaches for it with an ambitious attemp at a wafted square-drive but his bat's far from making contact, pacy over from Nel
good length ball comes into him, he stands and drives to cover with a loud call of 'NO' back to Munaf
good length ball on off stump moves into him, Agarkar stands and again pushes that to cover
hits that same spot again, little movement on the ball, Agarkar holds his ground and checks the shot to cover
fuller delivery outside off stump, Agarkar almost gets to the pitch of it and pushes to cover once more, Kallis working it up here
this one's angled into the pads and Agarkar neatly tucks that past square leg for a single
full and moving into leg stump, Munaf just stands there and tries to drive across the line but gets an inside edge onto the boot and the ball rolls to midwicket
good length ball outside off stump, he stands and defends off the toes
short and wide outside off stump, ball kicks up as Agarkar gets up on the toes again and has a waft at it, Nel lets out a cry of anguish followed by that cheeky grin back to the batsman
another short rising delivery outside off stump that Agarkar ducks under
quick, short and wide, stands up as Agarkar flashes the bat at it, ball whizzes of the outside edge and sails over the slip cordon for four to third man
another short delivery on the stumps, Agarkar gets on top of it and defends with a dead straight bat
short and wide, Agarkar jumps and times the square cut quite well past Gibbs at backward point, ball speeds across the turf and Langeveldt covers good ground, saves runs on the ropes

all over! Fast on a good length outside off stump, pitches and cuts in sharply off the surface, Agarkar stands and drives loosely but plays all over it and loses his off stump, Kallis gets his third and South Africa have won by 157 runs and take a 1-0 lead in the series
